dialogues.speaker: HippieSpring
dialogues.text: Hey, little bouncy buddy! Where are you rushing to?

dialogues.speaker: Jumpy
dialogues.text: Umm... You seem a bit... high.

dialogues.speaker: HippieSpring
dialogues.text: Haha, you bet! I'm high up here! Both physically and spiritually.

dialogues.speaker: Jumpy
dialogues.text: No, that's not what I meant... Ah, never mind.

dialogues.speaker: HippieSpring
dialogues.text: Dude, I'm so high I can see you bouncing from up here!

dialogues.speaker: Jumpy
dialogues.text: No, no, it's not what you think. WiseSpring cursed me! Now I can't stop jumping.

dialogues.speaker: HippieSpring
dialogues.text: Oh, bummer, dude! But hey, at least you'll never hit rock bottom, right?
